articles.description: It is understood royal staff are 'moving heaven and earth' to ensure Her Majesty can attend the most prestigious race meet of the year.
articles.content: Plans are being put in place to ensure the Queen will be able to cheer her horses on from the royal box at the Platinum Jubilee Epsom Derby and perhaps bag the 'fairytale' racing win that has so far … [+8402 chars]

articles.title: Spiritualized - 'Everything Was Beautiful': a sonic feast - NME
articles.description: The man also known as J. Spaceman delivers a dense, orchestrated record that is as solid as it is sprawling
articles.content: Youve gotta hand it to Jason Pierce: he is a master of sonics. Throughout Spiritualizeds 30-odd-year existence, hes consistently fused psychedelia with gospel, free jazz, rock’n’roll, heartbreak blue… [+2353 chars]

articles.author: Andrea Cavallier
articles.title: Prince Harry tells NBC's Hoda Kotb he loves 'chaos and learning' of being dad to Archie and Lilibet - Daily Mail
articles.description: Prince Harry,37, says he loves the 'chaos and learning' of fatherhood as he opened up about his cheeky son, 2, in an interview with Today Show' s Hoda Kotb Wednesday.
articles.content:
Hoda: 'There was one woman who came up to me yesterday and she said something that totally struck me in my soul. She said the Invictus Games saved my life. How does that land for you?'
